about_the_game:
What our players have to say about Border Clash:
  • “Technologies and resources make the game less random. You can plan ahead and develop tactics that give you an edge. I like how competitive it is.”
  • “More depth than Risk, but not complicated to learn the basics”
  • “I like that everything is happening at once - had a little bit of thinking of what to do next”

Outsmart your opponents




  • Easy to learn, difficult to master
  • Simultaneous turns require you to anticipate your opponents moves
  • Outplay your opponents with superior tactics

Your strategy matters




  • Research makes all the difference - Over 30 technologies give you distinct economic and military advantages
  • Carefully manage scarce resources and grow your economy
  • Try different strategies and develop your edge

Endless re-playability




  • Games are fast - Simultaneous turns lead to faster pace, less waiting around
  • Games are deep - Randomised resources, various strategies, challenging opponents
  • Game are competitive - Train with strong AI players, then rise on the public leaderboard

Early Beta Access

short_description: Border Clash is a tactical, competitive Multiplayer strategy game with simultaneous turns, fast rounds and endless re-playability. Research technologies to develop a strategic advantage and outsmart your opponents in epic 6-player battles.
